extendedInfo.description: CC Tracker is a workout-logger app for Convict Conditioning and is intended to be used in conjunction with Paul Wade's book.Now with export/import feature, workout schedule, and between set rest timer!If you are into Bodyweight workout using CC, this is THE Convict Conditioning App for you!Features:* Log your progress in each of the Big 6 workouts (Pushups, Squat, Pullups, Legraise, Bridge, and Handstand Pushups)* Uses customizable audio feedback for timing your reps (up/down and pause times) for each of the Big 6.    Helps you keep for example that 2s-1s-2s timing suggested by Paul for Pushups.* Schedule your workouts, so you always know what exercises are due.* Check your progress on all 6 workouts on the start screen.* Use between set rest timer to keep your workouts consistent.* Export your workouts. Now you can graph your progress in Excel.* Import workouts. To import keep the file content structure the same as when you export. The exercise names can be anything, as they will be replaced with the ones from the book.If you want to test the app before purchase, there is also a trial version with limited workout logging. You can now import data from the trial app, so you can seamlessly switch between trial and full version. Just export in the trial version and import in the full version.Thanks for all the user suggestions. You help making this the best Convict Conditioning app available for Android.Permissions:Wake Lock: Is only used while the timer is running to prevent screenlock. Not used otherwise. And if you turn off the timer it is not used at all.Write to external Storage: For export feature.Disclaimer: Broken Loop is not affiliated with Paul Wade or Dragon Door Publishing

reviews.title: Very Useful App
reviews.comment: I can\'t complain about an app this user friendly. It keeps me at the right pace while I focus on the exercises. Still getting to know it, but so far so good.
reviews.author: Buddha Jones

reviews.title: Easiest way to track workouts.
reviews.comment: If you are following the convict conditioning programs, this is much easier than writing it down. If it would export to fitocracy, that would be even more awesome.
reviews.author: John C

reviews.title: No flexibility
reviews.comment: This is an ok app for recording our convict conditioning training. Would highly recommend if it didn\'t  lock you into a set number of sets. Please update to allow more sets. Add this and it\'ll be a five star app. CC2 app would be great too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Makes keeping track of progress a breeze
reviews.comment: I really like this app, it makes following the cc program very easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: Its a good tracker I love it but one thing that can make it better is pictures of the moves and also making it for multiple users for buddies that work out and then also tips on how to progress between steps
reviews.author: Caleb Thomas

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: Pretty cool. Does what it says on the lid. No frills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and straight forward. Makes it easy to track workouts. Had some problems with figuring out some parts like how to delete or edit a previous entry. It would be nice to just click on the entry to do this.
reviews.author: Viktoria K

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: Its easy to use and does what I needed.  I love the counter.  It allows me to focus on the movement and the muscles involved.  My only compliant is that the rest timer freezes if I have to switch to another app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I went through a number of Play store difficulties to get this app but it was definitely worth it if you\'re serious about convict conditioning training.  You can log trainings anywhere and the feature to schedule which steps you need to do each day is very useful.   3 suggestions: 1.Add a trifecta check (convict conditioning 2) 2. Add neck, calf, side, grip work exercises in a seperate section 3. Make it possible to log more than 2 work sets... im doing 5 per training (trying to follow solitary confinement)
reviews.author: Galimir Dilkin

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Gives me a easy log of what I do, would be good to have a manual as I don\'t understand how the timing functions work but I guess I don\'t need em
reviews.author: Mark Edwards

reviews.title: Amazing, incredible!
reviews.comment: This approach is a bloody lifesaver! Makes it amazingly easy to manage my workout, especially through the beautiful, simple and incredibly well thought out UI.  A must have for anyone at any stage in their Convict Conditioning!
reviews.author: Tom Reid

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love the app, it helps me keep track of my workouts. I do wish that it would let me edit my log though
reviews.author: Nick Hilliard

reviews.title: Surprised by good ratings
reviews.comment: I think the people rating this highly don\'t know how a good program should behave.  Why is the progression hidden by default? Why is there no visual indication the progression is scrollable? The play stop button doesn\'t work properly. I could go on... I\'m disappointed by this app and regret buying it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Determined
reviews.comment: Focused tracking and simple modes
reviews.author: Red A

reviews.comment: An excellent tool based on the book.  Wish there was an update to include the sequel, Convict Conditioning 2.\t...or read the book; I want to get stronger than you!
reviews.author: allen horne

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Could add some descriptive pics to the different levels, but that\'s ok even without..
reviews.author: Istvan Nyarady

reviews.title: Seriously need the ability to edit entries
reviews.comment: This app seriously needs the ability to edit or delete individual logged entries. We are humans and sometimes mistype. Once you save an incorrect entry there is no way to edit or delete it. Other than that this is an OK app. Not great but does its job.
reviews.author: Ryan Rice

reviews.title: Scheduler?
reviews.comment: Not sure that this app was worth the money spent as all it does is count. Maybe I\'m just not tech savvy enough to understand it but the scheduler seems to be just a check box that doesn\'t really do anything.
reviews.author: Joshua Barney

reviews.title: Just needs exercise pics :-)
reviews.comment: Love this app. Makes it very easy to keep track of progress :-). Only thing I would suggest is some form of picture for each exercise progression.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inspiration
reviews.comment: It inspire me, to improve my physical condition. Thanks for it.
reviews.author: A Google User
